name: Space station under attack
description:
==Controls==

    R - restart the level when it inevitably becomes too destroyed

    WASD - walking

    Right-click - place walls to protect yourself from bullets and bombs

    Left-click - throw bombs to destroy the walls and kill the enemies

    

        ==Story==

    The scientist has to get to the control center to stop the spies, which want to take the ship and pass the device of warp to his enemy government. Dodge bullets of spies and holes of the device of warp, create walls to protect yourself, and get to the control center.

    But you have to hurry! Each minute the chaos increases.
